attributes.additional_details: The BBC is a unique national resource and an agent of soft power for the UK globally. To remove the licence fee and so effectively destroy the BBC would be an act of cultural vandalism and self-harm to the UK
attributes.background: Retain the BBC’s licence based funding system beyond its threatened removal in 2027.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606445
